languages.text: {n}С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. Старшие изо всех сил пытаются успокоить младших. Несколько вооруженных мятежников следят за испуганными, но {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}невредимыми{/d} заложниками, но сами нервно озираются по сторонам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. Старшие изо всех сил пытаются успокоить младших. Несколько вооруженных мятежников следят за испуганными заложниками, но сами нервно озираются по сторонам.

languages.text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}С десяток человек — взрослых и детей — испуганно жмутся друг к другу. Старшие изо всех сил пытаются успокоить младших. Несколько вооруженных мятежников следят за испуганными, но {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}невредимыми{/d} заложниками, но сами нервно озираются по сторонам.{/n}

Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine Gruppe von etwa zehn Leuten, darunter auch Kinder, kauert sich verängstigt zusammen. Die älteren Familienmitglieder geben sich größte Mühe, die jüngeren zu beruhigen. Mehrere bewaffnete Aufständische bewachen die verängstigten, aber {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unverletzten{/d} Geiseln, doch die Wachen sehen sich selbst nervös um.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine Gruppe von etwa zehn Leuten, darunter auch Kinder, kauert sich verängstigt zusammen. Die älteren Familienmitglieder geben sich größte Mühe, die jüngeren zu beruhigen. Mehrere bewaffnete Aufständische bewachen die verängstigten Geiseln, doch die Wachen sehen sich selbst nervös um.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une dizaine de personnes apeurées, dont des enfants, se serrent les unes contre les autres. Les aînés font ce qu'ils peuvent pour calmer les plus jeunes membres de leur famille. Plusieurs insurgés armés surveillent les otages effrayés, mais {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}indemnes{/d}, tandis que les surveillants eux-mêmes regardent nerveusement autour d'eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une dizaine de personnes apeurées, dont des enfants, se serrent les unes contre les autres. Les aînés font ce qu'ils peuvent pour calmer les plus jeunes membres de leur famille. Plusieurs insurgés armés surveillent les otages effrayés, mais {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}indemnes{/d}, tandis que les surveillants eux-mêmes regardent nerveusement autour d'eux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}十几个人正害怕地挤在一起，其中还有孩子。年长的家庭成员正努力让年轻人平静下来。几名全副武装的叛军士兵正在监视着惊恐不已但{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}毫发无伤{/d}的人质，而这些监视者自己也在紧张地四处张望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}十几个人正害怕地挤在一起，其中还有孩子。年长的家庭成员正努力让年轻人平静下来。几名全副武装的叛军士兵正在监视受惊的人质，而这些监视者自己也在紧张地四处张望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}およそ10名、その中には子供がいて、恐怖で肩を寄せ合っている。家族の年長者達は、何とか若者達を落ち着かせようと必死だ。数人の武装した反乱者が怯えつつも{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}無傷{/d}の人質を監視して、見張り役が神経質に辺りを見回している。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}およそ10名、その中には子供がいて、恐怖で肩を寄せ合っている。家族の年長者達は、何とか若者達を落ち着かせようと必死だ。数人の武装した反乱者が怯える人質を監視して、見張り役が神経質に辺りを見回している。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unas diez personas, con niños entre ellas, se acurrucan asustadas. Los familiares mayores hacen lo que pueden para calmar a los jóvenes. Varios insurgentes armados vigilan a unos rehenes asustados pero {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}ilesos{/d}, pero los propios vigilantes miran nerviosos a su alrededor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unas diez personas, con niños entre ellas, se acurrucan asustadas. Los familiares mayores hacen lo que pueden para calmar a los jóvenes. Varios insurgentes armados vigilan a los asustados rehenes, pero los propios vigilantes miran nerviosos a su alrededor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Aralarında çocukların da bulunduğu yaklaşık on kişi, korku içinde bir araya toplanmış. Yaşça büyük olan aile üyeleri, küçükleri sakinleştirmek için ellerinden geleni yapıyor. Birkaç silahlı asi, korkmuş ancak henüz {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}zarar görmemiş{/d} rehineleri izlerken bir yandan da etrafa gergin gerin bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Some ten people, children among them, are huddling together in fear. The elder family members are doing what they can to calm the young. Several armed insurgents are watching the frightened yet {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_Raycad_Early}unharmed{/d} hostages, but the watchers themselves are looking around nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Aralarında çocukların da bulunduğu yaklaşık on kişi, korku içinde bir araya toplanmış. Yaşça büyük olan aile üyeleri, küçükleri sakinleştirmek için ellerinden geleni yapıyor. Birkaç silahlı asi, korkmuş rehineleri izlerken bir yandan da etrafa gergin gerin bakıyor.{/n}
